titleStmt.title: News Clipping About Eartha White's Honorary Degree of Doctor of Humanity at Florida Normal Industrial School.

respStmt.name: Antonia Grant Bryant and Janaya Ferrer

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: News clipping about Eartha White being awarded honorary degree of Doctor of Humanities at Florida Normal Industrial School.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

div.p:
Miss Ertha M. M. White, shown
above, crowned as the "Angel of
Mercy" was awarded the honorary
degree of Doctor of Humanity at the
Florida Normal Industrial School
commencement exercises held recent-
ly at the Ancient City (St. Augus-
tine).

The degree signifies great honor
and esteem. Only two of its kind
and known to the public in the
United States. Miss White also re-
ceived a similar degree from Presi-
dent Franklin D. Roosevelt. She is
the head of the famous Clara White
Mission on Ashley Street.

Miss White is recognized as one
of the State's leading characters and
her many friends and acquaintances
wish for her continued success.
